name: Reyes Supply Company
description: Reyes Supply Company is a wholesale electrical distributor founded in 1991, serving North Carolina with a wide range of commercial and residential brands. They specialize in commercial lighting and controls

name: Cordero Handcrafted Lighting (CHL)
description: Cordero Handcrafted Lighting offers exquisite lighting designs and personalized services. Owners Dan and Dawn Cordero guide customers through a diverse range of handcrafted lighting products

name: El Callejon Art
address: Not specified, but offers online sales and shipping
description: El Callejon Art specializes in handcrafted Mexican lighting, including blown glass lighting, San Miguel lighting, and tin plate and glass lightings. They offer free shipping on many items

name: Lights Unlimited Inc.
address: Multiple locations including Fuquay Varina, Garner, Wake Forest, and Wilson, NC
description: Lights Unlimited is a locally owned lighting and fan showroom serving North Carolina since 1983, offering a large selection, competitive prices, and expert assistance

name: Christie's Lighting Gallery
description: Christie's Lighting Gallery offers decades of expertise in lighting design with a curated selection of home lighting and interior fixtures, serving Fletcher, NC, Asheville, and beyond

name: Butler Lighting USA
address: Multiple showrooms, including a 10,000+ sq. ft. showroom in High Point, North Carolina
description: Butler Lighting USA is an American family-owned business with over 70 years of experience in lighting for custom homes, residential, and commercial projects. They offer a vast selection of lighting collections

name: Coastal Lighting Gallery
description: Coastal Lighting Gallery offers a wide selection of lighting, ceiling fans, and accessories, with a focus on durable outdoor fixtures for coastal environments. They are a division of Safrit's Building Supply

name: Hi-Lite Services
description: Hi-Lite Services provides commercial lighting services, including installation and repairs, and offers commercial LED lighting solutions

name: Electric Supply Company
address: Multiple locations throughout North Carolina, including P.O. Box 6427, Raleigh, NC 27628
description: Electric Supply Company is a wholesale electrical distributor with over 60 years of experience, providing electrical supplies, including lighting, to contractors and industrial clients

name: Desco
address: Multiple locations across North Carolina, including Salisbury
description: Desco is an electrical supply partner offering a wide range of products, including lighting solutions, and is committed to customer satisfaction with knowledgeable staff
